title: What are the most popular public playlists on Spotify? - Quora

response.answer_text: This question is quite complicated to answer given the way Spotify allows users to search for playlists (i.e., there is no way to sort playlists by popularity).  I wrote a tool that can discover this information using libspotify and here are a quick top 5 from my search:  now listening to... by daniel (~860k subscribers)Billboard Hot 100 by billboard.com (~710k subscribers)Black N Yellow by snoopdog (~640k subscribers)Hipster International by napstersean (~600k subscribers)Axwell's Party Playlist by 119641708 (~480k subscribers) I'm also maintaining an updating top 50 list of Spotify playlists here: The Most Popular Playlists on Spotify (edit: my original search strategy was wrong and it's likely much more accurate now. I've updated the list above to reflect that.)

I think Sony Music (Sweden) has got the most popular playlist with over 90.000 subscribers, and some playlists with around 50.000 subscribers, http://open.spotify.com/user/sonymusicentertainmentSony has done a lot of marketing inside Spotify (free) to get people to subscribe. Our Topsify UK Top 40 playlist has over 24.000 subscribers: http://open.spotify.com/user/topsifyBy viral marketing. A nice feature in Spotify would be a Playlist Top 40, based on number of subscribers!
